product.title: Roma Natural - Vertical Blind
product.description: The roma in natural is just a whisper of a cream, with a finely woven fabric and a gentle, natural hue. An effective filter blind, this is the model of class, style, and neutrality. The natural will work as part of almost any colour scheme, being particularly suited to clean, fresh rooms full of soft pastels, such as pinks or blues - the perfect colour scheme for a nursery or child's bedroom. Or hang it in the living room amongst country greens and fresh, dainty florals, for a charmingly rustic feel with a contemporary twist.

relproducts.title: Voile Natural Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their voile range of fabrics create a natural feature of the rooms natural light, and are fantatic at creating some privacy without sacrificing light. This cream natural coloured screen fabric, in its neutral colour and clean finish, creates a centre point of your window. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this cream blind is not only made by their expert team in the heart of yorkshire, but comes with customer-first service and guarantees.

relproducts.title: Splash Natural Hessian Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time. relproducts.description: Their range of decorative slats are the perfect alternative to a plain, single colour venetian blind. This light brown wood effect venetian blind is perfect to create the look of a wooden blind in rooms, such as bathrooms, where wood isn't suitable. relproducts.title: Simplicity Linen Natural Roller Blind
relproducts.description: With a lovely grainy texture and a light and neutral tone, the simplicity linen natural blind brings an organic flavour to your home. The translucent fabric allows a small amount of light to sift through, creating a warm and inviting glow that protects you from glare and deliver with a lovely grainy texture and a light and neutral tone, the simplicity linen natural blind brings an organic flavour to your home.

relproducts.title: Roma Natural - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This roma is natural by name, and natural by nature. This creamy off-white shade will allow plenty of light to penetrate through into the room, while still offering plenty of privacy when needed, meaning that you could have this blind closed all the time if need be. An excellent choice for rooms needing both privacy and light, such as a bathroom or bedroom, this shade will match pretty much any colour scheme.

relproducts.title: Thermatex Natural Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: This natural looking thermatex blind is perfect for adding colour into a room but keeping it beautifully neutral too. And as well as looking great, it works incredibly hard for you and your home. The thermatex fabric has a special coating that reflects up to 78% of the heat this natural looking thermatex blind is perfect for adding colour into a room but keeping it beautifully neutral too.

The flecked, linen-look design is easy to pair with lots of de make your home feel extra homey with the simplicity linen natural vertical blind.

relproducts.title: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

relproducts.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the amor salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

relproducts.title: Amor Soft Peach Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of blackout fabrics are perfect for blocking the light entering your room. Use these to give your room privacy whenever you need it. Especially when you order the amor soft peach, a perfectly peachy colour to cover your window. Being blackout, no light will be able to pass through the fabric making it perfect for living rooms and bedrooms. relproducts.description: Light and bright, the meadow lark vertical blind is ideal for enhancing a minimalist interior. As well as looking great, this window blind also boasts pollen and dust mite reducing qualities.
